## Inferential statistics

```{r}
library(ez)
library(report)
```

```{r}
ANOVA_OUTPUT = 
  ezANOVA(
    data = participant_means,
    dv = mean_score,
    wid = participant,
    within = condition,
    return_aov = TRUE
  )
```

```{r}
ANOVA_OUTPUT$ANOVA %>% select(-ges) %>% kable(row.names = F, digits=4)
```

### Automated summary using `report()`

```{r}
r = report(ANOVA_OUTPUT$aov)
```

```{r}
r
```

```{r}
summary(r)
```

```{r}
as.data.frame(r)
summary(as.data.frame(r))
```
